site.title: Grimm platform. XGM cryptocurrency. Privacy protected blockchain powered by mimblewimble.
site.description: Grimm is a first modular platform with a new Confidential Parallel-chains architecture that provides the ability to create your own independed mimblewimble blockchain for any project or product. New blockchains created on the Grimm platform are called Confidential Assetchains. Working confidential assetchains, cross-chain (and cross-assetchain) atomic swaps, Defi apps based on assetchains, Lightning second layer scaling solution, Dex, â€” these are just a few Grimm opportunities. Schnorr multi-signature functionality combined with simple smart contracts off-chain using scriptless scripts open up a new privacy world for businesses and commercial solutions.
